title: Chat issues
body: I log in and it says no one is on, none of my Clubs/chat groups are active, and i get a message saying disconnected from chat, restarting client isn't working? help, anyone else stuck with this issue?

replies.body: Hey all, we found and fixed some problems. Anyone able to confirm this is resolved for them now?

Was having problems this morning, now they're good I think. However, on all my friend's profiles, it says they've won 100% of their ranked games, but doesn't even show all their games. For one of my friends, I know for a fact he's played more than 100 ranked matches, but it says 53/53 Wins. 

This hasn't changed since the morning.
